input_args.text: "Next Prev Swipe left/right Kathy Burke had a wonderful response to Helena Bonham Carter in the letters page of Time Out Before celebrities could argue with each other on social media, they had to do it in the letters pages of magazines and newspapers. In the 90′s Kathy Burke had this wonderful response to Helena Bonham Carter complaining about hard it is being pretty and posh. (via @KathyBurke) \nMarvellously eloquent and succinct. In the 90's, before Twitter, one had to express oneself through the letters page of Time Out pic.twitter.com/IfojETpGnM"
